Summary: 4 saucer like objects appeared as bright spots in the sky. Showed up in photos.
divs: Sighting Details"bright spots" in clouds appeared as saucers with rainbow like "cooling tower" formations above them in photo. Not noticeable to the naked eye. My friend who took these photos said she felt "compelled" to keep returning to the window to take photos. she noticed these shapes in the photos and at first noticed only the ones on the left. The one more toward the center of the picture was noticed in the photo only.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hardwick
This sighting has never been favorited.
